description: This is a beautiful trail, partly on the Bruce Trail that traverses the escarpment offering great views. It follows a lovely stream in the lower reaches and on top crosses the highest point on the Bruce Trail (no view from here though).
directions: Side road 6 east of Gibraltar Ontario to travel top to bottom or Pretty River Rd, travel west off hwy 26 and park where the stream crosses the road to travel bottom to top.
title: Pretty River Escarpment Trail
